sub_topic: Prove that the symmetric difference of two sets is distributive over union.
message_1: Let A = {5, 7, 9, 13} and B = {9, 13, 15, 20}. Find the symmetric difference of (A ∆ B) ∪ A and (A ∪ A) ∆ (B ∪ B), and prove that the two results are equal, showing that the symmetric difference of two sets is distributive over union.
